main event: Several unidentified flying object sightings reported at Amarillo Air Force Base, Texas, on November 17 and November 23, 1957.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a glowing object that appeared to move upward and lower in a westward direction, lasting about 1 minute., The second sighting described a round, white, glowing object, the size of a hill, which veered up and to the right after moving toward the observer., One report speculated that the observer probably saw an aircraft that was in the vicinity at the time., Multiple sightings reported and documented by the 68th Aircraft Control and Warning Squadron., Observers described varying conditions including clear weather during the sightings.
sighted object: glowing object and round, white object
